column1: # the line above should start with the name of the table,
# then per column: the column name, a colon (:) and the type of the column (num, str, bool, date, datetime or timestamp).
# and of course each column is separated with a semi colon (
# De lines below are the data that will be inserted in the table. All values should be enclosed using double quotes ("...") except for num and bool values.
# The empty or null value is represented with NULL, which should never be enclosed using double quotes.
# Lines that start with a hash sign (#) will be ignored. Great for adding comments.
